A Display of My Dark Power:
0 When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.
Abandon Hope:
0 As an additional cost to cast ~, discard X cards.
0 Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
Abandoned Outpost:
0 ~ enters the battlefield tapped.
0 {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
0 {T}, Sacrifice ~: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
Abattoir Ghoul:
0 First strike
0 Whenever a creature dealt damage by ~ this turn dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

0 Protection from red

0 Vigilance
Abbey Matron:

Abduction:
0 Enchant creature
0 When ~ enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature.
0 You control enchanted creature.
0 When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Abeyance:
0 Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
0 Draw a card.
Abjure:
0 As an additional cost to cast ~, sacrifice a blue permanent.
0 Counter target spell.
Abolish:
0 You may discard a Plains card rather than pay ~'s mana cost.
0 Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Abomination:
0 Whenever ~ blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
Aboroth:
0 Cumulative upkeep—Put a -1/-1 counter on ~.

1 Enchant creature
0 Enchanted creature has flying.
0 Threshold — Enchanted creature has shroud as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

0 Tap an untapped Cephalid you control: Tap target permanent.
0 {U}{U}{U}: Tap all creatures without flying.

0 Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
Absolute Grace:
0 All creatures have protection from black.
Absolute Law:
0 All creatures have protection from red.

0 Haunt
0 When ~ enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

0 Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

0 Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

Abundance:
0 If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

Call to Arms:
0 As ~ enters the battlefield, choose a color and an opponent.
0 White creatures get +1/+1 as long as the chosen color is the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls but isn't tied for most common.
0 When the chosen color isn't the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls or is tied for most common, sacrifice ~.

Camouflage:
0 Cast ~ only during your declare attackers step.
0 This turn, instead of declaring blockers, each defending player chooses any number of creatures he or she controls and divides them into a number of piles equal to the number of attacking creatures for whom that player is the defending player. Creatures he or she controls that can block additional creatures may likewise be put into additional piles. Assign each pile to a different one of those attacking creatures at random. Each creature in a pile that can block the creature that pile is assigned to does so.

Chains of Mephistopheles:
0 If a player would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in his or her draw step each turn, that player discards a card instead. If the player discards a card this way, he or she draws a card. If the player doesn't discard a card this way, he or she puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

0 Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
0 When enchanted creature dies, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Griffin Rider:
0 As long as you control a Griffin creature, ~ gets +3/+3 and has flying.
Griffin Sentinel:
390 Flying
32 Vigilance
Grifter's Blade:
43 Flash
0 As ~ enters the battlefield, choose a creature you control it could be attached to. If you do, it enters the battlefield attached to that creature.
1 Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
11 Equip {1}
Grim Affliction:
0 Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate.
Grim Discovery:
0 Choose one or both — Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand; and/or return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
Grim Feast:
1 At the beginning of your upkeep, ~ deals 1 damage to you.
0 Whenever a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you gain life equal to its toughness.
Grim Harvest:
2 Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
0 Recover {2}{B}
Grim Lavamancer:
0 {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: ~ deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Grim Monolith:
15 ~ doesn't untap during your untap step.
2 {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.
0 {4}: Untap ~.
Grim Poppet:
0 ~ enters the battlefield with three -1/-1 counters on it.
0 Remove a -1/-1 counter from ~: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
Grim Reminder:
0 Search your library for a nonland card and reveal it. Each opponent who cast a card this turn with the same name as that card loses 6 life. Then shuffle your library.
0 {B}{B}: Return ~ from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
Grim Tutor:
0 Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose 3 life.
Grimclaw Bats:
391 Flying
0 {B}, Pay 1 life: ~ gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Grimgrin, Corpse-Born:
0 ~ enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
0 Sacrifice another creature: Untap ~ and put a +1/+1 counter on it.
0 Whenever ~ attacks, destroy target creature defending player controls, then put a +1/+1 counter on ~.
Grimoire Thief:
0 Whenever ~ becomes tapped, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library face down.
0 You may look at cards exiled with ~.
0 {U}, Sacrifice ~: Turn all cards exiled with ~ face up. Counter all spells with those names.
Grimoire of the Dead:
0 {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a study counter on ~.
0 {T}, Remove three study counters from ~ and sacrifice it: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types.
Grindclock:
1 {T}: Put a charge counter on ~.
0 {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of charge counters on ~.
Grinding Station:
0 {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
1 Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, you may untap ~.
Grindstone:
0 {3}, {T}: Put the top two cards of target player's library into that player's graveyard. If both cards share a color, repeat this process.
Grinning Demon:
2 At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
0 Morph {2}{B}{B}
Grinning Demon Avatar:
0 Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent discards a card.
Grinning Ignus:
0 {R}, Return ~ to its owner's hand: Add {2}{R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
Grinning Totem:
0 {2}, {T}, Sacrifice ~: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.
Grip of Amnesia:
0 Counter target spell unless its controller exiles all cards from his or her graveyard.
51 Draw a card.
Grip of Chaos:
0 Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random.

0 Whenever a creature dies, ~ gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Grixis:
0 Blue, black, and/or red creature cards in your graveyard have unearth. The unearth cost is equal to the card's mana cost.
0 Whenever you roll {C}, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

1 {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
0 {R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.

Natural Affinity:
0 All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
Natural Balance:
0 Each player who controls six or more lands chooses five lands he or she controls and sacrifices the rest. Each player who controls four or fewer lands may search his or her library for X basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield, where X is five minus the number of lands he or she controls. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
Natural Emergence:
0 When ~ enters the battlefield, return a red or green enchantment you control to its owner's hand.
0 Lands you control are 2/2 creatures with first strike. They're still lands.
Natural Order:
0 As an additional cost to cast ~, sacrifice a green creature.
0 Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Natural Selection:
0 Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle his or her library.
Natural Spring:
0 Target player gains 8 life.
Naturalize:
7 Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Nature Demands an Offering:
0 When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a creature you don't control and puts it on top of its owner's library, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land. Then the owner of each permanent chosen this way shuffles his or her library.

0 When four or more creatures attack you, abandon this scheme at end of combat.

0 {G}{W}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or that creature gains banding, first strike, or trample.

9 Enchant creature you control
1 {0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.
